Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Increases the distance allowed between cannabis storefronts and premises for adult-use on-site consumption and school grounds and houses of worship; restricts their distance with a child day care
Summary: Increases the distance allowed between cannabis storefronts and premises for adult-use on-site consumption and school grounds and houses of worship; restricts their distance with a child day care.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to doubling the distance allowed between cannabis storefronts and premises for adult-use on-site consumption and school grounds and houses of worship; and restricting their distance with a child day care
